mapper.select: SELECT rr.`id`, rr.`name`, rr.`code` FROM rbac_role rr LEFT JOIN rbac_user_role rur ON rr.id = rur.role_id WHERE rur.user_id = #{userId} union all SELECT rr.`id`, rr.`name`, rr.`code` FROM rbac_role rr LEFT JOIN rbac_org_role ror ON ror.role_id = rr.id LEFT JOIN rbac_org_user rou ON ror.org_id = rou.org_id WHERE rou.user_id = #{userId} union all SELECT rr.`id`, rr.`name`, rr.`code` FROM rbac_role rr LEFT JOIN rbac_group_role rgr ON rgr.role_id = rr.id LEFT JOIN rbac_group_user rgu ON rgr.group_id = rgu.group_id WHERE rgu.user_id = #{userId}
